article.title: Colon cancer treatment: a review of preclinical and clinical studies on the use of natural products

multiple_choice_question.text: Which strain of *G. lucidum* resulted in a significantly lower yield of fruiting bodies compared to strains MUS192 and MUS19?
Which wood substrate resulted in the highest yield of *G. lucidum* fruiting bodies?
Which strain of *G. lucidum* produced fruiting bodies with the lowest β-glucan content?
Which wood substrate resulted in *G. lucidum* fruiting bodies with a significantly higher β-glucan content compared to Pine?
